definition: to fly up to the sky
a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: emptying buckets and baths, and storing them upside-down.
sentences.chinese: 排空水桶和浴盆，倒置存放。

sentences.english: The use of gastric emptying rate of phenol red measured response in each group pyloric sphincter pressure in rats.
sentences.chinese: 利用酚红测胃排空率反应各组大鼠胃幽门括约肌压力。

sentences.english: Intake below-standard purity automatic emptying, adsorption tower.
sentences.chinese: 进气纯度不达标自动排空，吸附塔。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate risk factors and management of DGE after gastric surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胃切除术后排空障碍的高危因素及处理。

sentences.english: However, LUT is in active state during filling phase and voiding phase .
sentences.chinese: 然而，在充盈和排空期，下尿路处于动态。

sentences.english: C-octanoic acid breath test may represent a feasible method for measurement of gastric emptying.
sentences.chinese: 辛酸呼气试验是检测胃排空的理想选择。

sentences.english: Immediately before the physical examination, the patient should void as normally and completely as possible.
sentences.chinese: 在体格检查前患者应该放松和排空膀胱。

sentences.english: Once the flow channel has emptied, all flow from the silo stops.
sentences.chinese: 一旦流动通道被排空，料仓中的所有流动就停止了。

sentences.english: The rate of gastric emptying was correlated with the stomach weight-body weight ratio.
sentences.chinese: 安静时之胃排空速率与胃重体重比率呈显著之相关。

sentences.english: Gastric emptying was determined by the phenol red method.
sentences.chinese: 酚红排泄法测定大鼠胃排空率。

sentences.english: The rectum and colon must be completely empty before surgery.
sentences.chinese: 手术前病人的结肠和直肠必须排空。

sentences.english: After treating for 4 weeks, the gastric emptying rate of rats was measured by radioisotopic technique.
sentences.chinese: 用药4周后，用放射性核素法检测其胃的排空率。

sentences.english: Therefore, food evacuation is very important for your stomach health.
sentences.chinese: 因此食物排空对养胃很关键。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the experimental methods for observing mouse gastric emptying (GE) and small intestine propulsion (SIP).
sentences.chinese: 目的改进小鼠胃排空及小肠推进的实验方法。

sentences.english: Study on gallbladder emptying function in the asymptomatic gallstone patients.
sentences.chinese: 无症状胆囊结石病患者胆囊排空功能的研究。

sentences.english: A fully drainable hybrid shoe offers the comfort of a running shoe.
sentences.chinese: 一个完全排空的混合鞋提供了跑鞋的舒适性。

definition: variant of 排泄[pai2 xie4]/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
to drain (factory waste etc)/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
